``DefaultLoggingMsgBuilder`` (Class)
====================================

**Brief Description:** This class is a default implementation of the `LoggingMsgBuilder` interface.

**Detailed Description:**

    It provides a simple way to build log messages with a specific format.

*In file* ``src/util/default_logging_msg_builder.hh``

.. _default_logging_msg_builder_hh_build_after_msg:

``build_after_msg`` (Function)
------------------------------

*See:* :ref:`LoggingMsgBuilder::build_after_msg <logging_msg_builder_hh_build_after_msg>`

-------------------------------
